item.name: [COLOR white] Rochdale vs Tottenham Hotspur: 16:00 | 18/2/18 [/COLOR]

link.sublink: http://sportstv-1872968023.us-west-1.elb.amazonaws.com/tv/d3h2bh4k8bq46f_fs2_12.m3u8|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/64.0.3282.167 Mobile Safari/537.36

item.summary:
They may be struggling at the wrong end in League One, but in the FA Cup, there is no stopping Rochdale.
The Dale have conquered the likes of Championship Millwall and fellow third-tier outfit Doncaster Rovers, and have been fortunate to avoid a big club on their run to the last 16.
However, that big club has come calling with the visit of Mauricio Pochettinoâ€™s Tottenham - fresh off their remarkable comeback at Juventus in midweek.
Spurs have been surprisingly tested by lesser opposition this season, fairly fortuitous to sneak past a resolute Wimbledon at Wembley in the third round and needing a replay to beat League Two Newport County in the previous tie
